channel.title: I Need A Quick Reply

item.title: I Need A Quick Reply
item.dc:creator: @warouxriot warouxriot
item.description:
@warouxriot wrote:

[code]Hello, i am trying to make it so drops show as the items that the DEAD player had in his inventory, im using 508 mezzy-scape source this is my drops list for when a player dies

[codeEngine.items.createGroundItem(526, 1, absX, absY, heightLevel, “”);
Engine.items.createGroundItem(385, 1, absX, absY, heightLevel, “”);
Engine.items.createGroundItem(randomPVPdrop(), 1, absX, absY, heightLevel, “”);
Engine.items.createGroundItem(randomFOODdrop(), 1, absX, absY, heightLevel, “”);
Engine.items.createGroundItem(995, Misc.random(50000), absX, absY, heightLevel, “”);
Engine.items.createGroundItem(385, 1, absX, absY, heightLevel, “”);
Engine.items.createGroundItem(385, 1, absX, absY, heightLevel, “”);
Engine.items.createGroundItem(385, 1, absX, absY, heightLevel, “”);
Engine.items.createGroundItem(385, 1, absX, absY, heightLevel, “”);
Engine.items.createGroundItem(385, 1, absX, absY, heightLevel, “”);[/code] Thank you.
